omniProcessElements.name: SetTransferFundsToOwnAccountSummary

"%TransferFromSelection:Name%", "TransferFromAccountNumber" : "%TransferFromSelection:AccountNumberLast4%", "TransferFromAccount" : "%TransferFromSelection:FinancialAccountLabel%", "TransferToAccountName" : "%TransferToSelection:Name%", "TransferToAccountNumber" : "%TransferToSelection:AccountNumberLast4%", "TransferToAccount" : "%TransferToSelection:FinancialAccountLabel%", "TransferToType" : "%TransferToSelection:RecordTypeName%", "TransferFromType" : "%TransferFromSelection:RecordTypeName%", "Remarks" : "=IF(%Remarks%,%Remarks%,'N/A')", "TransferMode" : "%TransferMode%", "TransferSchedule" : "%ScheduleTransferOptions%", "StartDate" : "%StartDate%", "EndDate" : "%EndDate%", "Frequency" : "%Frequency%", "Installment" : "%NumberOfInstallments%", "CreditorLoanRecurringAmountTransferOption" : "=IF((%TransferToSelection:RecordTypeName% == 'Credit Card' && %TransferMode% == 'Recurring'),%CreditCardDuesPaymentOption%,IF(((%TransferToSelection:RecordTypeName% == 'Mortgage' || %TransferToSelection:RecordTypeName% == 'Loan Account' || %TransferToSelection:RecordTypeName% == 'Auto Loan' )&& %TransferMode% == 'Recurring'),%LoanPaymentOption%,null))", "CreditorLoanOneTimeAmount" : "=IF(((%TransferToSelection:RecordTypeName% == 'Credit Card' || %TransferToSelection:RecordTypeName% == 'Mortgage' || %TransferToSelection:RecordTypeName% == 'Loan Account' || %TransferToSelection:RecordTypeName% == 'Auto Loan' ) && %TransferMode% == 'One-time' && %AddFundTransferDetails:CreditOrLoanDestinationAccount:SelectedRadioAmountOption:SelectedRadioValue% != 'Custom'),%AddFundTransferDetails:CreditOrLoanDestinationAccount:SelectedRadioAmountOption:SelectedRadioValue%,IF(CONTAINS(%AddFundTransferDetails:CreditOrLoanDestinationAccount:CustomAmountValue:CustomAmount%, '.'),CONCATENATE(%TransferToList:AccountCurrency%,' ',%AddFundTransferDetails:CreditOrLoanDestinationAccount:CustomAmountValue:CustomAmount%),CONCATENATE(%TransferToList:AccountCurrency%,' ',%AddFundTransferDetails:CreditOrLoanDestinationAccount:CustomAmountValue:CustomAmount%,'.00')))", "CreditorLoanTransferDate" : "=IF(((%TransferToSelection:RecordTypeName% == 'Credit Card' || %TransferToSelection:RecordTypeName% == 'Mortgage' || %TransferToSelection:RecordTypeName% == 'Loan Account' || %TransferToSelection:RecordTypeName% == 'Auto Loan' )&& %TransferMode% == 'One-time' && %AddFundTransferDetails:CreditOrLoanDestinationAccount:SelectedTransferSchedule:SelectedDateValue% != 'Custom Date'),%AddFundTransferDetails:CreditOrLoanDestinationAccount:SelectedTransferSchedule:SelectedDateValue%,%AddFundTransferDetails:CreditOrLoanDestinationAccount:CustomDateValue:CustomDate%)", "LoanAmountRecurring" : "=IF(((%TransferToSelection:RecordTypeName% == 'Mortgage' || %TransferToSelection:RecordTypeName% == 'Loan Account' || %TransferToSelection:RecordTypeName% == 'Auto Loan')&& CONTAINS(%LoanPaymentAmount%, '.')),CONCATENATE(%TransferToList:AccountCurrency%,' ',%LoanPaymentAmount%),CONCATENATE(%TransferToList:AccountCurrency%,' ',%LoanPaymentAmount%,'.00'))", "OtherAmount" : "=IF(((%TransferToSelection:RecordTypeName% != 'Credit Card' && %TransferToSelection:RecordTypeName% != 'Mortgage' && %TransferToSelection:RecordTypeName% != 'Loan Account' && %TransferToSelection:RecordTypeName% != 'Auto Loan')&& CONTAINS(%Amount%, '.')),CONCATENATE(%TransferToList:AccountCurrency%,' ',%TransferAmount%),CONCATENATE(%TransferToList:AccountCurrency%,' ',%TransferAmount%,'.00'))", "OtherTransferDate" : "=IF(((%TransferToSelection:RecordTypeName% != 'Credit Card' && %TransferToSelection:RecordTypeName% != 'Mortgage' && %TransferToSelection:RecordTypeName% != 'Loan Account' && %TransferToSelection:RecordTypeName% != 'Auto Loan') && %TransferMode% == 'One-time'),%OneTimeTransferDate%,null)", "isCommunitySite" : "%isCommunitySite%" } }, "showPersistentComponent" : [ true, false ], "show" : { "group" : { "operator" : "AND", "rules" : [ { "data" : "true", "condition" : "<>", "field" : "NoAccountsFound" } ] } },
